content: this fast easy hat is designed with a floppy brim as well as a flopped-over point whip one up for yourself and another for your favorite pumpkin shown with neckwarmer from the witch warmers 1 pattern update the hook used on the pictured hat was a new boye size n hook it was mis-labeled by the manufacturer the actual hook size should be l but if you have a boye size n it might be one of the wrong-labeled ones and give you the correct gauge please check gauge before proceeding a note about yarn this hat turns out best with a stiff worsted weight yarn choose one that is not labeled soft red heart super saver acrylic worsted was used for the hat in the photo us crochet terms schematic diagram included hook us l / 8 0 mm crochet hook yarn 156-206 yds / 143-189m worsted weight acrylic wool or blend in 3 colors approximate size 12 tall approximate gauge 11 sts x 14 row = 4 x 4 /10 5cm x 10 5cm skill level easy 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/witch-warmers
